title: Kevin Connolly: Let's Hug It Out B*tch! (Part 1)
itunes:title: Kevin Connolly: Let's Hug It Out B*tch! (Part 1)
description:
Ari Gold's favorite frenemy E aka "The Pizza Boy" himself is in the studio! Kevin Connolly stops by for an epic 2 part interview covering everything you want to know. Past beefs, current endeavors, and of course ENTOURAGE. There's so much going on I don't even know where to start. You just have to listen to find out!

We want to hear from you! Leave us voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven and you could have your question answered on a future episode.

IG: @HowULivinJPivenPodcast
Twitter: @howulivinjpiv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Kevin's IG: https://www.instagram.com/mrkevinconnolly/?hl=en

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
